channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
Hello.
Every time i try getting on my mates server through the client i get a error which says [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Please help me
Much Appriciated

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

nope dont work… my java is java6 update 10 which one is recommended?

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

try editing the [ run ] on ur client folder,…

and copy nd paste this into it,…

@ECHO OFF color 77 title server name here echo Running server name here JAVA -Xmx500m client

were it says [ server name here ] change that to ur server name,
goodluck i hope it works,

if not tell me cud be ur java,…

Read full topic
